mapper.select: select * from album left join singer on album_singer=singer_id limit #{startIndex},#{pageSize}
select * from album left join singer on album_singer=singer_id where album_id=#{albumId}
select * from album left join singer on album_singer=singer_id where album_name like CONCAT('%',#{albumName},'%')
select * from album where album_singer=#{singerId} order by album_time desc
mapper.insert: insert into album(album_name, album_singer, album_details, album_time,album_img) values (#{albumName},#{albumSinger},#{albumDetails},#{albumTime},#{albumImg})
mapper.update: update album set album_name=#{albumName}, album_singer=#{albumSinger}, album_details=#{albumDetails}, album_time=#{albumTime},album_img=#{albumImg} where album_id=#{albumId}
